data.name: Antaria Online
data.detailed_description:
Antaria Online is a Cross-Platform MMORPG being developed with community feedback. After washing up on the shores of an unknown island, players must fight monsters and complete quests to advance. Join the fun as you grow from zero to hero!

Currently the following is available for players:
Adventurer Job
Bandit Job
Crusader Job
Mounts
PvE Zones - Monsters, quests, loot, and a hard level cap at level 50. The cap will raise as new zones are released.
Hub City - A hub to access PvE zones and access things such as a bank, a premium shop, quest givers, and more.
Crafting - Craft all kinds of neat stuff.
Factions - Level up several different factions.
Party - Join with up to 4 players to adventure together!
Chat - Chat with other players!

data.short_description: Antaria Online is a Cross-Platform MMORPG being developed with community feedback.

pc_requirements.minimum:
Minimum:
  • Requires a 64-bit processor and operating system
  • OS: Windows XP SP2+
  • Processor: SSE2 instruction set support.
  • Memory: 2 GB RAM
  • Graphics: DX9 (shader model 3.0) or DX11 with feature level 9.3 capabilities.
  • DirectX: Version 9.0
  • Network: Broadband Internet connection
  • Storage: 500 MB available space
pc_requirements.recommended:
Recommended:
  • Requires a 64-bit processor and operating system

mac_requirements.minimum:
Minimum:
  • Requires a 64-bit processor and operating system
  • OS: Mac OS X 10.8+
  • Processor: SSE2 instruction set support.
  • Memory: 2 GB RAM
  • Graphics: DX9 (shader model 3.0) or DX11 with feature level 9.3 capabilities.
  • Network: Broadband Internet connection
  • Storage: 500 MB available space
mac_requirements.recommended:
Recommended:
  • Requires a 64-bit processor and operating system

linux_requirements.minimum:
Minimum:
  • Requires a 64-bit processor and operating system
  • OS: Ubuntu 18.04+
  • Processor: SSE2 instruction set support.
  • Memory: 2 GB RAM
  • Graphics: DX9 (shader model 3.0) or DX11 with feature level 9.3 capabilities.
  • Network: Broadband Internet connection
  • Storage: 500 MB available space
